description: The ironic config option for the password and auth token are not marked as secret so the values will get logged during startup in debug mode.
title: ironic password config not marked as secret

comments.content: The ironic config option for the password and auth token are not marked as secret so the values will get logged during startup in debug mode.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content: In the past, the VMT has not considered info leaks in debug logs to warrant an advisory. Reclassifying as security hardening.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~fungi

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/179857
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=63aa353c676a094fbf02e799115a884c70a48002
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 63aa353c676a094fbf02e799115a884c70a48002
Author: Joe Gordon <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon May 4 11:19:33 2015 -0700

    Mark ironic credential config as secret
    
    Mark ironic credentials as secret so we don't log the values.
    
    Detected with bandit while testing out:
    I3026b81317f0a6322acfc94784899a7453af586f
    
    Change-Id: Icfd13b3294a9fa0881a5ab01f50864ebcbce393e
    Closes-Bug: #1451931
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
